TopicTitle: So, I've mssed out a bit

Articles.Content:
Haven't played since 1.9 due to catastrophic power unit failure of my KSP playing computer

What's new?

Why not try it out?

I don't have a computer to run it
Try watching some 0.22 vids on youtube, all the latest features are explained.

Theres an enormous amount of new things. I cant even go into detail as to how many.

The entire game has been revised compared to 1.9
1.9? the current version is .22! or do you mean .19?
Here's a short description..
I'm one of the newbies here.

1.9? the current version is .22! or do you mean .19?

He's from the future. 1.8 is where squad added microtransactions and an arcade mode, so he decided to come back.
Hmm. Well the game-changing features are pretty minimal....just SCIENCE AND A TECH TREE! Those are pretty big with the latest update...other than that not much of not to really speak of.

Here's my list:


  • New command pods
    TONS of new parts
    External command seats
    Revised SAS system
    A new kind of rover wheel (it's a medium sized grey one)
    New space center
    Can hire Kerbals
    Can chose what Kerbals you want on rockets
    Mun now has tons craters
    The lighting system no longer causes glares that make it impossible to see anything
    You can now move around in the KSC menu
    Kerbals can plant flags (you can make your own, custom flags too)
    CAREER MODE!!
    You can now collect SCIENCE!!
    Science can be transmitted
    Science can be used to unlock new parts at the R&D complex
    Some engines now have an awesome glow effect
    The island airport has been redone
    The game is now on steam
    The patcher now works
    There is a launcher
    There is an installer
    The version number is 0.22.0
    Kerbals now have expressions on EVA
    The crew container now has an IVA
    The landing legs now have suspension
    Sub-assemblies are now in the stock game
    There are runway lights
    "End Flight" has been REMOVED
    New loading Screen
    The first part no longer must be a command pod(and command pods may be swapped out)
    MOAR Bugs!
    MOAR Boosters!

Congratulations if you had the patience to read all that...

1.9? the current version is .22! or do you mean .19?[/

Just .19

unfortunately im not from the future where KSP is space engine on steroids

EVA expressions was .19

He's from the future. 1.8 is where squad added microtransactions and an arcade mode, so he decided to come back.

...and now, everyone in my office is wondering why i am laughing so hard...

...nice...
If you have a modular power supply it should be a breeze to fix it. I got an over kill 750 W PSU for $110. If you think I could help fix you problem I would be glad to do so.
